short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Toggles available StreetView Coverage on Google Maps

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: If you've ever missed a keyboard shortcut to toggle StreetView Coverage on Google Maps this extension is here to help. With this extension you can press Alt-S (on Windows/Linux) or Option+S (on Mac) and the StreetView coverage will toggle.
